channel.title: The Between: Beta Playtest 2
channel.description:
This is for 4 playtest sessions of The Between. You must be able to attend each session.
Content warning: This game is really dark and has lots of sexual content. If that is not your jam, please sign up for something else.
![IMG_0026|333x500](upload://xeMdLVS5TRj3gh1QxW5XKMJzvHt.jpeg)
